results.title: Simvastatin attenuates diabetes mellitus erectile dysfunction in rats by miR-9-5p-regulated PDCD4.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Smooth_Muscle_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018235 @@@Cavernous smooth muscle@@@ cells (CMSCs) obtained from DMED rats were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ and transfected with the plasmid vector that interferes with miR-9-5p or @GENE_PDCD4 @GENE_64031 @@@PDCD4@@@ to observe cell viability and apoptosis.

citations.NLM: Weng Y, Mao Y, Wang Y, Jiao Y, Xiang J, Le W. Simvastatin attenuates diabetes mellitus erectile dysfunction in rats by miR-9-5p-regulated PDCD4. Acta Biochim Pol. 2023 Nov 6;():. PMID: 37929666

results.title: Dysfunction of vascular smooth muscle and vascular remodeling by simvastatin.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Smooth_Muscle_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018235 @@@Dysfunction of vascular smooth muscle@@@ and vascular @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@remodeling@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Kang S, Woo HH, Kim K, Lim KM, Noh JY, Lee MY, Bae YM, Bae ON, Chung JH. Dysfunction of vascular smooth muscle and vascular remodeling by simvastatin. Toxicol Sci. 2014 Apr;138(2):446-556. PMID: 24449418
